botan.cert.x509.crl_ent

CRL Entry

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

class CRLEntryImpl: botan.asn1.asn1_obj.ASN1Object;
This class represents CRL entries

const ref const(Vector!ubyte) serialNumber();
Get the serial number of the certificate associated with this entry.

Returns:
certificate's serial number

const const(X509Time) expireTime();
Get the revocation date of the certificate associated with this entry

Returns:
certificate's revocation date

const CRLCode reasonCode();
Get the entries reason code

Returns:
reason code

this(bool throw_on_unknown_critical_extension);
Construct an empty CRL entry.

this(in X509CertificateImpl cert, CRLCode why = UNSPECIFIED);
Construct an CRL entry.

Params:
X509CertificateImpl cert the certificate to revoke
CRLCode why the reason code to set in the entry
